amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the authorizing of leases under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to any person in violation of various Iranian sanctions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 113-131 to prohibit the authorizing of leases under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to any person in violation of various Iranian sanctions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
